channel.title: 🏢 School of Computer Science and Cyber Engineering, Guangzhou University, China on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Computer Science and Cyber Engineering, Guangzhou University, China on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Unifying Homophily and Heterophily for Spectral Graph Neural Networks via Triple Filter Ensembles
item.description: TFE-GNN: A novel spectral GNN using triple filter ensembles for superior homophily/heterophily handling and improved generalization on real-world graphs.
